//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//<auto-generated>
//</auto-generated>
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

using Splat;
using ReactiveUI.Builder;
using Avalonia;

namespace Simplify.ReactiveUI;

public static class SplatRegisterExtensions
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Register all items using SplatRegisterAttribute, SplatRegisterConstantAttribute, SplatRegisterLazySingletonAttribute, SplatRegisterViewModelAttribute
    /// </summary>
    public static void RegisterAll(this IMutableDependencyResolver resolver)
    {
        resolver.Register(() => new Simplify.ReactiveUI.Test.Address(), null);
    }

    /// <summary>
    /// Register all items using SplatRegisterAttribute, SplatRegisterConstantAttribute, SplatRegisterLazySingletonAttribute, SplatRegisterViewModelAttribute
    /// </summary>
    public static void RegisterAll(this ReactiveUIBuilder builder)
    {
        AppLocator.CurrentMutable.Register(() => new Simplify.ReactiveUI.Test.Address(), null);
    }

    /// <summary>
    /// Register all items using SplatRegisterAttribute, SplatRegisterConstantAttribute, SplatRegisterLazySingletonAttribute, SplatRegisterViewModelAttribute
    /// </summary>
    public static void RegisterAll(this AppBuilder builder)
    {
        RegisterAll(AppLocator.CurrentMutable);
    }
}
